newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia L&G plans to list subsidiary.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia L&G plans to list subsidiary.

text.p: Land & General Bhd has proposed to list its subsidiary in the oil and gas sector on the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange's main board through a new investment holding company, Bumi Armada Bhd.

It said in a statement late on Monday that it would sell its entire 70 percent stake in Bumi Armada Navigation to Bumi Armada for 26.39 million ringgit in a share swap arrangement that would result in Land & General owning 60.2 percent of Bumi Armada's enlarged capital.
The listing exercise also includes a five-for-47 rights issue of 4.67 million new Bumi Armada shares at an issue price of 2.0 ringgit per share.
Bumi Armada would subsequently make a public issue of 14.5 million new shares at 3.70 ringgit each.
Bumi Armada Navigation provides marine transportation and support services for the offshore oil and gas industry.
